name: Malthael
title: Aspect of Death
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 100 damage and healing Malthael for 44 per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

abilities.name: Wraith Strike
abilities.description: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 59 damage and refreshing Reaper's Mark.

abilities.name: Death Shroud
abilities.description: After 0.25 seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies Reaper's Mark to enemies it hits.

heroics.name: Tormented Souls
heroics.description: Gain 10 Armor and unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

heroics.name: Last Rites
heroics.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health. Repeatable Quest: Enemies killed while under the effect of Last Rites permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 15 seconds.

original.name: Malthael
original.title: Aspect of Death
original.description: Once the Aspect of Wisdom, Malthael abandoned heaven after the Worldstone's destruction. In secret, he had resolved to end the Eternal Conflict by becoming a Reaper of Souls and eliminating everything affected by demonic corruption, including humanity.
original.shortDescription: An Assassin who marks his enemies, shredding away High Health enemies.

baseHeroInfo.name: Malthael
baseHeroInfo.title: Aspect of Death
baseHeroInfo.description: Once the Aspect of Wisdom, Malthael abandoned heaven after the Worldstone's destruction. In secret, he had resolved to end the Eternal Conflict by becoming a Reaper of Souls and eliminating everything affected by demonic corruption, including humanity.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: An Assassin who marks his enemies, shredding away High Health enemies.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Reaper's Mark
trait.description: Basic Attacks afflict non-Structure targets with Reaper's Mark for 4 seconds. Marked enemies are revealed and take damage equal to 2% of their maximum Health every 1 second.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Extract the souls of nearby enemies afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 100 damage and healing Malthael for 44 per target hit. Heroic targets heal Malthael for an additional 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

abilities.name: Wraith Strike
abilities.description: Instantly teleport through an enemy afflicted by Reaper's Mark, dealing 59 damage and refreshing Reaper's Mark.

abilities.name: Death Shroud
abilities.description: After 0.25 seconds, unleash a wave of dark mist that applies Reaper's Mark to enemies it hits.

skins.name: Aspect of Death
skins.description: Once the Aspect of Wisdom, Malthael abandoned heaven after the Worldstone's destruction. In secret, he had resolved to end the Eternal Conflict by becoming a Reaper of Souls and eliminating everything affected by demonic corruption, including humanity.

skins.name: Grave Warden Malthael
skins.description: With every corpse interred in his mausoleum, the Grave Warden gains power and influence. His unholy alliance with the Grave Keeper ensures that his collection of souls will continue to grow.

skins.name: Season's Reapings Malthael
skins.description: Also known as the Ghost of Winter Veil Yet-to-Come, Malthael offers those he visits in the cold dark night a glimpse of their future. Unsurprisingly, their "future" is always death.
